entry.title: Azerbaijan attempts to freeze Armenians out of Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Azerbaijan attempts to freeze Armenians out of Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
The Armenians of Nagorno-Karabakh are once again without heating gas, facing subzero temperatures at night and heavy snowfall. A humanitarian crisis is unfolding to which the world is paying little attention. After 10 days without gas supply, the pipeline was finally restored on March 19. Only three days later, Azerbaijan has once again cut off the gas supply to Nagorno-Karabakh, spelling concerns that Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev seeks to freeze the Armenians out of Nagorno-Karabakh.

¬´‘ø’´’∂ ’´÷Ä’°’æ’°’∫’°’∑’ø’∫’°’∂’∂’•÷Ä’® ÷Ñ’°’µ’¨’•÷Ä ’•’∂ ’±’•’º’∂’°÷Ä’Ø’∏÷Ç’¥ ’Ä’°’µ’°’Ω’ø’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ’£’•’∂’§’•÷Ä’°’µ’´’∂ ’¢’º’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’§’•’¥¬ª ’Æ÷Ä’°’£’´÷Ä’´ ’∑÷Ä’ª’°’∂’°’Ø’∏÷Ç’¥ ‘ø’°’∂’°’∂÷Å ’°’ª’°’Ø÷Å’¥’°’∂ ÷á ‘ø’°’∂’°’∂÷Å ’∞’¶’∏÷Ä’°÷Å’¥’°’∂ ’º’•’Ω’∏÷Ç÷Ä’Ω ’Ø’•’∂’ø÷Ä’∏’∂’∂’•÷Ä’® ’¥’´ ’∑’°÷Ä÷Ñ ’§’°’Ω’®’∂’©’°÷Å’∂’•÷Ä ÷á ’°’ª’°’Ø÷Å’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’Æ÷Ä’°’£÷Ä’•÷Ä ’•’∂ ’´÷Ä’°’Ø’°’∂’°÷Å÷Ä’•’¨ ’¢’º’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’∏÷Ç’∂’´÷Å ’ø’∏÷Ç’™’°’Æ ’Ø’°’∂’°’∂÷Å ’∞’°’¥’°÷Ä÷â ’Ü’∏÷Ç’µ’∂ ’Æ÷Ä’°’£÷Ä’´ ’∑÷Ä’ª’°’∂’°’Ø’∏÷Ç’¥ ¬´’Ñ’´’∞÷Ä¬ª ’™’°’¥’°’∂’°’Ø’°’Ø’´÷Å ’∫’°÷Ä’´ ’©’°’ø÷Ä’∏’∂’∂ ’ß ÷É’∏÷Ä’±’∏÷Ç’¥ ’°÷Ä’æ’•’Ω’ø’´ ’¥’´’ª’∏÷Å’∏’æ ’∫’°’µ÷Ñ’°÷Ä’•’¨ ’°’µ’Ω ’≠’∂’§÷Ä’´ ’§’•’¥÷â
Within the framework of the "Women Human Rights Defenders Stepping up Against Gender-Based Violence in Armenia" program, the Women's Support and Women's Empowerment Resource Centers have implemented a number of support programs for women survivors of violence. Within the framework of the same program, the "Mihr" contemporary dance theater tries to combat this social issue through art.
*¬´‘ø’´’∂ ’´÷Ä’°’æ’°’∫’°’∑’ø’∫’°’∂’∂’•÷Ä’® ÷Ñ’°’µ’¨’•÷Ä ’•’∂ ’±’•’º’∂’°÷Ä’Ø’∏÷Ç’¥ ’Ä’°’µ’°’Ω’ø’°’∂’∏÷Ç’¥ ’£’•’∂’§’•÷Ä’°’µ’´’∂ ’¢’º’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’§’•’¥¬ª (2020-2022 ’©’©‚Ä§) ’Æ÷Ä’°’£’´÷Ä’∂ ’´÷Ä’°’Ø’°’∂’°÷Å’æ’∏÷Ç’¥ ’ß ‘∏’∂’§’§’•’¥ ’Ø’°’∂’°’∂÷Å ’∂’Ø’°’ø’¥’°’¥’¢ ’¢’º’∂’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’Ø’∏’°’¨’´÷Å’´’°’µ’´ ’Ø’∏’≤’¥’´÷Å ‘µ’æ÷Ä’∏’∫’°’Ø’°’∂ ’¥’´’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ÷Ü’´’∂’°’∂’Ω’°’æ’∏÷Ä’¥’°’¥’¢÷â
*‚ÄúWomen human rights defenders stepping up against gender-based violence in Armenia‚Äù (2020-2022) project is implemented by the Coalition to Stop Violence against Women with the financial support of the European Union.

entry.title: Rival rallies take place in Yerevan in support of and in opposition to Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine

media:group.media:title: Rival rallies take place in Yerevan in support of and in opposition to Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine
media:group.media:description:
üìçRival rallies take place in Yerevan in support of and in opposition to the Russian invasion of Ukraine. üìç208 Armenian civilians and servicemen still remain unaccounted for since the conclusion of the 2020 Nagorno-Karabakh war, according to Armenia‚Äôs Investigative Committee. üìçRussian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov holds separate phone conversations with both Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan and Azerbaijani Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov.
